ch.unige.ng.fitness
Class GrayCodeFitness

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.fitness.GrayCodeFitness
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>
public class GrayCodeFitness
extends java.lang.Object
implements Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>

This class is used to calculate a fitness. You have to give a fitness to this class and it will call the fitness with a created individual identical to the current but into double using the grayCode .

Version:
2 mai 2005
Author:
Fontignie Jacques
